title: Automation Hub UI

detailed_design.description: Design and implement Automation Hub UI: agents, cron jobs, automations, scripts, status logs, error reports. Unifies scaffold AppSidebar (Agents/Cron/Automations) with roadmap Automation Dashboard. Single concept for capability.automation_engine.
detailed_design.solution: 1. Consolidate Agents, Cron, Automations as Automation Hub sub-sections. 2. Add scripts list view. 3. Add status logs and error reports view. 4. Connect to agent-processes, cron-jobs, automations APIs.

acceptance_criteria: Automation Hub consolidates agents, cron, automations

user_stories.story: As a user, I want to see all automations in one place.
As a user, I want to view script status and error logs.

technical_notes.current_issue: Sidebar has Agents/Cron/Automations but backend returns empty; no scripts/logs/reports view
